name: Wind For Your Sails
description:
A small game I made for school. The assingment was to combine the physical world to the digital world. I chose to use sound as the input.

The app contains two different things: a game in which your goal is to get your sailboat to the other side of the course and not have it sink in a storm. And an interactive where there is no goal, just play with the same mechanic and see the waves get bigger and the scene darker as storm clouds gather
